paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.1310_1313delAAGA, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 74 female patients with suggestive inherited predisposition to breast and ovarian cancers
patients.phenotype: breast cancer diagnosed at age 50 or younger and/or positive family history

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In total, the c.1310_1313delAAGA frameshift was found in 14 patients among 123 screened for this pathogenic variant.

functional_data.summary: The c.1310_1313delAAGA mutation is recurrent with high frequency in patients from the North-East region of Morocco.

variants.segregation_data: All carriers shared the same geographic origin in the North-East of Morocco.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is already listed and reported deleterious in multiple databases.
key_quotes: The c.1310_1313delAAGA mutation of BRCA2 gene is recurrent with high frequency in patients from the North-East region of Morocco.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
